item.description:
Vegan Potluck with world renowned animal welfare activist Anthony Marr

Sunday, August 22, 2010
12:00 - 3:00 pm

Maple Farm Sanctuary
101 North Avenue, Mendon, MA
508-473-7539

Vegan potluck with guest speaker Anthony Marr. If possible, please bring a vegan dish to add to the potluck- if not, please just come by and enjoy some great food and great people!! Any donations to Maple Farm Sanctuary are welcome but not required. World Renowned wildlife preservationist, leading anti-hunting activist, environmentalist, author and speaker, Anthony Marr, who is currently on his 40-states-in-7-months "Compassion For Animals Road Expedition" speaking tour #7 will be speaking on animal rights, hunting, environmental concerns and the urgent subject of his second book "Homo Sapiens! SAVE YOUR EARTH".
item.name: Maple Farm Sanctuary Potluck and speaker Anthony Marr!
